thread.title: Hugo

author: Hugo
title: Hugo
text: Website is ridiculous and for each time you change home need to create new account so i have change 3 times house i have at least 3 accounts multiplied by 2 because i have gas and electricity and on the same statement dont show everything. Service, because i order the new smart system and after 1 month later i insisted and energia says that is not possible to intall the smart system on my system, after paying 200 euros in up-front, on each i have seach professional advise and theres no problem.
